item.title: Create an virtual guest
item.author: Enthusiastic Hugo User
item.description:
Operation: POST

Method: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest::createObject()

URL: SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest

Example CURL: curl -u username:api_key --data @createVirtualServer.json "https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3/SoftLayer_Virtual_Guest"

Input JSON:

{ 
    "parameters":[ 
    { 
        "datacenter" : {
            "name" : "sjc01"
        },
        "sshKeys" : [
            {"id" : "1234"}
        ],
        "hostname": "new", 
        "domain": "Test.com", 
        "startCpus": 1, 
        "maxMemory": 1024, 
        "hourlyBillingFlag": true, 
        "localDiskFlag": false, 
        "operatingSystemReferenceCode": "DEBIAN_LATEST" ,
        "postInstallScriptUri": "https://pastebin.com/raw.php?i=asf3231"
    } 
    ] 
}
